mapper.select: SELECT DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID /*2차레벨조직ID*/ , DGR2_LEVL_OG_NM /*2차레벨조직명*/ , HOO_OG_TP_CD /*조직장조직유형코드*/ , HOO_PRTNR_NO /*조직장파트너번호*/ , BLD_CD /*빌딩코드*/ , BLD_NM /*빌딩명*/ FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ /*T:월조직내역*/ WHERE 1=1 AND BASE_YM = #{baseYm} /*기준년월*/ AND OG_LEVL_DV_CD = '2' /*조직레벨구분코드-지역단*/ AND DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID = #{dgr1LevlOgId} /*총괄단조직ID-부모화면의 정산대상 grid에서 DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID 값*/

SELECT T1.BASE_YM /*(hidden)기준월*/ , T2.DGR1_LEVL_OG_NM /*1차레벨조직명-총괄단*/ , T2.DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID /*1차레벨조직명-총괄단*/ , T2.DGR2_LEVL_OG_NM /*2차레벨조직명-지역단*/ , T2.DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID /*(hidden)2차레벨조직ID-지역단*/ , T2.OG_TP_CD /*(hidden)2차레벨조직유형코드-지역단*/ , T2.DGR3_LEVL_DG_PRTNR_NO /*(hidden)2차레벨대표파트너번호-지역단*/ , T1.OG_ID /*(hidden)정산조직ID*/ , T1.OG_TP_CD AS DST_OJ_OG_TP_CD/*(hidden)배분대상조직유형코드*/ , T1.PRTNR_NO /*배분대상파트너번호*/ , T1.PRTNR_KNM /*배분대상자명*/ , T1.PSTN_DV_CD /*(hidden)직급구분코드*/ , T1.RSB_DV_CD /*(hidden)직책구분코드*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'RSB_DV_CD', T1.RSB_DV_CD) AS RSB_DV_NM /*직책명*/ , T3.PERF_VAL /*배분대상자실적금액*/ , 0 AS DST_AMT /*배분금액*/ , 0 AS DST_WHTX /*(hidden)배분원천세*/ , 0 AS ERNTX /*(hidden)배분소득세*/ , 0 AS RSDNTX /*(hidden)배분주민세*/ , T3.CARD_USE_AMT /*(hidden)카드사용금액*/ , NVL((SELECT SUM(S1.DST_AMT) FROM TB_CBCL_OPCS_ADJ_DTL S1 /*T:운영비정산상세*/ WHERE S1.OPCS_ADJ_NO = T3.OPCS_ADJ_NO ),0) AS ADJ_FSH_DST_AMT /*(hidden)정산완료배분합계금액*/ , T3.ADJ_YN /*(hidden)정산여부*/ , T2.BLD_CD /* 빌딩코드 */ , T2.BLD_NM /*빌딩명 */ FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T1 /*T:월파트너내역*/ INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T2 /*T:월조직내역*/ ON T2.BASE_YM = T1.BASE_YM AND T2.OG_ID = T1.OG_ID INNER JOIN (SELECT A.BASE_YM /*기준월*/ , A.OG_TP_CD /*조직유형코드*/ , A.PRTNR_NO /*파트너번호*/ , C.OPCS_ADJ_NO /*운영비정산번호*/ , C.ADJ_YN /*정산여부*/ , NVL((SELECT SUM(S1.PERF_VAL) FROM TB_FEAM_MACUP_PERF_CL S1 /*월누적파트너실적마감*/ WHERE S1.BASE_YM = A.BASE_YM AND S1.OG_TP_CD = A.OG_TP_CD AND S1.PRTNR_NO = A.PRTNR_NO AND S1.MM_ACU_PERF_AGRG_CRT_DV_CD = '00' /*월누적실적집계생성구분코드-00:총주문월누적*/ AND S1.PERF_DV_CD = '2' /*실적구분코드-2:지국(지점)실적*/ GROUP BY S1.OG_TP_CD , S1.PRTNR_NO ),0) AS PERF_VAL /*실적값*/ , C.CARD_USE_AMT /*카드사용금액*/ FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ A /*T:월파트너내역*/ INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ B /*T:월조직내역*/ ON B.BASE_YM = A.BASE_YM AND B.OG_ID = A.OG_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT J1.OPCS_CARD_ID /*운영비카드ID*/ , J1.OPCS_ADJ_NO /*운영비정산번호*/ , J1.BASE_YM /*기준월*/ , J1.PSTN_DV_CD /*직급코드*/ , J1.ADJ_OG_ID /*정산조직코드*/ , J1.ADJ_OG_NM /*정산조직명*/ , J1.OG_TP_CD /*정산조직유형코드*/ , J1.ADJ_PRTNR_NO /*정산파트너번호*/ , J1.ADJ_USR_NM /*정산사용자명*/ , J1.ADJ_YN /*정산여부*/ , NVL(J1.CARD_USE_AMT,0)-NVL(J1.MSCR_USE_AMT,0) AS CARD_USE_AMT /*카드사용금액-카드사용금액-유가증권사용금액*/ FROM TB_CBCL_OPCS_ADJ_CARD_IZ J1 /*T:운영비정산기본*/ WHERE 1=1 AND J1.BASE_YM = #{baseYm} /*기준월*/ AND J1.USE_YN = 'Y' /*사용여부*/ AND J1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) C ON C.BASE_YM = A.BASE_YM AND C.OG_TP_CD = A.OG_TP_CD AND C.ADJ_PRTNR_NO = A.PRTNR_NO WHERE 1=1 ) T3 ON T3.BASE_YM = T1.BASE_YM AND T3.OG_TP_CD = T1.OG_TP_CD AND T3.PRTNR_NO = T1.PRTNR_NO WHERE 1=1 AND T1.BASE_YM = #{baseYm} /*기준월*/ AND T1.RSB_DV_CD = #{rsbDvCd} /*직책코드*/ AND T2.HGR_OG_ID = #{mainOgId} /*정산조직ID-부모화면에서 리턴 받음*/
AND T2.DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID = #{dgr2LevlOgId} /*지역단 콤보박스에서 리턴 값*/
AND T2.BLD_CD = #{bldCd} /*빌팅 콤보박스에서 리턴 값*/
AND T1.OG_TP_CD = #{subOgTpCd} /*배분대상조직유형코드-팝업화면 대상자입력 시 리턴값*/ AND T1.PRTNR_NO = #{subPrtnrNo} /*배분대상파트너번호-팝업화면 대상자입력 시 리턴값*/

SELECT T1.BASE_YM /*(hidden)기준월*/ , T3.OPCS_ADJ_NO /*(hidden)운영비정산번호*/ , T3.ADJ_OG_ID /*(hidden)정산조직ID*/ , T3.OG_TP_CD /*(hidden)조직유형코드*/ , T3.ADJ_PRTNR_NO /*(hidden)정산파트너번호*/ , T2.DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID /*1차레벨조직명*/ , T2.DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID /*2차레벨조직명*/ , T2.DGR1_LEVL_OG_NM /*1차레벨조직명*/ , T2.DGR2_LEVL_OG_NM /*2차레벨조직명*/ , T3.DST_OJPS_NM /*배분대상자명*/ , T3.DST_OJ_OG_TP_CD /*(hidden)배분대상조직유형코드*/ , T3.DST_OJ_PRTNR_NO /*배분대상파트너번호*/ , T3.PSTN_DV_CD /*직급구분코드*/ , T1.RSB_DV_CD /*(hidden)직책구분코드*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'RSB_DV_CD', T1.RSB_DV_CD) AS RSB_DV_NM /*직책명*/ , T3.DST_OJPS_PERF_AMT /*(hidden)배분대상자실적금액*/ , T3.DST_AMT /*운영비 정산금액*/ , T3.DST_WHTX /*원천세*/ , T3.ERNTX /*(hidden)소득세*/ , T3.RSDNTX /*(hidden)주민세*/ , T3.MSCR_YN /*(hidden)유가증권여부*/ , T2.BLD_CD /* 빌딩코드 */ , T2.BLD_NM /*빌딩명 */ FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T1 /*T:월파트너내역*/ INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T2 /*T:월조직내역*/ ON T2.BASE_YM = T1.BASE_YM AND T2.OG_ID = T1.OG_ID INNER JOIN (SELECT A.OPCS_ADJ_NO /*운영비정산번호*/ , A.ADJ_OG_ID /*정산조직ID*/ , A.OG_TP_CD /*조직유형코드*/ , A.ADJ_PRTNR_NO /*정산파트너번호*/ , A.PSTN_DV_CD /*직급구분코드*/ , B.DST_OJ_OG_TP_CD /*배분대상조직유형코드*/ , B.DST_OJ_PRTNR_NO /*배분대상파트너번호*/ , B.DST_OJPS_NM /*배분대상자명*/ , A.MSCR_YN /*유가증권여부*/ , MAX(A.BASE_YM) AS BASE_YM /*기준년월*/ , MAX(B.DST_OJPS_PERF_AMT) AS DST_OJPS_PERF_AMT /*배분대상자실적금액*/ , SUM(B.DST_AMT) AS DST_AMT /*배분금액*/ , SUM(B.DST_WHTX) AS DST_WHTX /*배분원천세*/ , SUM(B.ERNTX) AS ERNTX /*소득세*/ , SUM(B.RSDNTX) AS RSDNTX /*주민세*/ , MAX(A.USE_AMT) AS USE_AMT /*사용금액*/ FROM TB_CBCL_OPCS_ADJ_BAS A /*T:운영비정산기본*/ INNER JOIN TB_CBCL_OPCS_ADJ_DTL B /*T:운영비정산상세*/ ON B.OPCS_ADJ_NO = A.OPCS_ADJ_NO INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ D /*T:월파트너내역*/ ON D.BASE_YM = A.BASE_YM AND D.OG_ID = A.ADJ_OG_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND B.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND A.BASE_YM = #{baseYm} /*기준년월*/ AND A.MSCR_YN = 'N' /*유가증권여부*/ GROUP BY A.OPCS_ADJ_NO /*운영비정산번호*/ , A.ADJ_OG_ID /*정산조직코드*/ , A.OG_TP_CD /*조직유형코드*/ , A.ADJ_PRTNR_NO /*정산파트너번호*/ , A.PSTN_DV_CD /*직급구분코드*/ , B.DST_OJ_OG_TP_CD /*배분대상조직유형코드*/ , B.DST_OJ_PRTNR_NO /*배분대상파트너번호*/ , B.DST_OJPS_NM /*배분대상자명*/ , A.MSCR_YN /*유가증권여부*/ ) T3 ON T3.BASE_YM = T1.BASE_YM AND T3.DST_OJ_OG_TP_CD = T1.OG_TP_CD AND T3.DST_OJ_PRTNR_NO = T1.PRTNR_NO WHERE 1=1 AND T3.ADJ_OG_ID = #{adjOgId} /*정산조직ID-부모화면에서 리턴 받음*/ ORDER BY T3.DST_AMT DESC

SELECT (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(MAX(OPCS_ADJ_NO),1,6) = #{baseYm} THEN #{baseYm}||LPAD((CAST(SUBSTR(MAX(OPCS_ADJ_NO),7,6) AS INT)+1),6,0) ELSE #{baseYm}||LPAD('1',6,0) END) AS OPCS_ADJ_NO /*운영비정산번호*/ FROM TB_CBCL_OPCS_ADJ_BAS WHERE 1=1 AND BASE_YM = #{baseYm}

/*해당월 확정완료 여부 체크*/ SELECT A.CNFM_YN /*확정여부*/ FROM TB_CBCL_OPCS_CNFM_BAS A /*T:운영비확정기본*/ WHERE 1=1 AND A.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND A.BASE_YM = #{baseYm} /*기준년월*/ AND A.OG_TP_CD = #{ogTpCd} /*조직유형코드*/ AND A.PSTN_DV_CD = (CASE WHEN A.OG_TP_CD = 'E01' THEN '0' /*EDU영업부*/ WHEN A.OG_TP_CD = 'E02' AND #{rsbDvCd} = 'E0201' THEN '1' /*EDU신채널-센터장*/ WHEN A.OG_TP_CD = 'E02' AND #{rsbDvCd} != 'E0201' THEN '2' END) /*EDU신채널-센터장 외*/ AND A.MSCR_YN = 'N'

SELECT T1.BASE_YM /*기준년월*/ , T1.PSTN_DV_CD /*직급구분코드*/ , T1.RSB_DV_CD /*직책코드*/ , T1.RSB_DV_NM /*직책명*/ , T1.OG_ID /*정산조직ID*/ , T1.ADJ_OG_NM /*정산조직명*/ , T1.ADJ_PRTNR_NO /*정산파트너번호*/ , T1.ADJ_USR_NM /*정산사용자명*/ , T1.OPCS_ADJ_NO /*운영비정산번호*/ , T1.ADJ_YN /*정산여부*/ , SUM(T1.BEF_CARD_LIM_AMT) AS BEF_CARD_LIM_AMT /*이전카드한도금액*/ , SUM(T1.BEF_CARD_USE_AMT) AS BEF_CARD_USE_AMT /*이전카드사용금액*/ , SUM(T1.BEF_CARD_RES_AMT) AS BEF_CARD_RES_AMT /*이전카드잔여금액*/ , SUM(T1.CARD_LIM_AMT) - SUM(T1.BEF_CARD_RES_AMT) AS CARD_ADD_AMT /*카드이월금액*/ , SUM(T1.CARD_LIM_AMT) AS CARD_LIM_AMT /*카드한도금액*/ , SUM(T1.CARD_USE_AMT) AS CARD_USE_AMT /*카드사용금액*/ , SUM(T1.CARD_RES_AMT) AS CARD_RES_AMT /*카드잔여금액*/ FROM (SELECT A.BASE_YM /*기준년월*/ , A.PSTN_DV_CD /*직급구분코드*/ , B.RSB_DV_CD /*직책코드*/ , (SELECT CD_CNTN FROM T_CMZ_CD_D S1 WHERE S1.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND S1.CD_ID = 'RSB_DV_CD' AND S1.CD_VLD_VAL = B.RSB_DV_CD ) AS RSB_DV_NM /*직책명*/ , B.OG_ID /*정산조직ID*/ , A.ADJ_OG_NM /*정산조직명*/ , A.ADJ_PRTNR_NO /*정산파트너번호*/ , A.ADJ_USR_NM /*정산사용자명*/ , A.OPCS_ADJ_NO /*운영비정산번호*/ , A.ADJ_YN /*정산여부*/ , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(#{baseYm},5,2) != '01' THEN (SELECT S1.CARD_LIM_AMT FROM TB_CBCL_OPCS_ADJ_CARD_IZ S1 WHERE S1.BASE_YM LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(S1.BASE_YM||'01','YYYYMMDD'),-1),'YYYYMM') AND S1.CRCDNO_ENCR = A.CRCDNO_ENCR AND S1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') ELSE 0 END) AS BEF_CARD_LIM_AMT /*이전카드한도금액*/ , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(#{baseYm},5,2) != '01' THEN (SELECT S1.CARD_USE_AMT FROM TB_CBCL_OPCS_ADJ_CARD_IZ S1 WHERE S1.BASE_YM LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(S1.BASE_YM||'01','YYYYMMDD'),-1),'YYYYMM') AND S1.CRCDNO_ENCR = A.CRCDNO_ENCR AND S1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') ELSE 0 END) AS BEF_CARD_USE_AMT /*이전카드사용금액*/ , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(#{baseYm},5,2) != '01' THEN (SELECT S1.CARD_RES_AMT FROM TB_CBCL_OPCS_ADJ_CARD_IZ S1 WHERE S1.BASE_YM LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(S1.BASE_YM||'01','YYYYMMDD'),-1),'YYYYMM') AND S1.CRCDNO_ENCR = A.CRCDNO_ENCR AND S1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') ELSE 0 END) AS BEF_CARD_RES_AMT /*이전카드잔여금액*/ , A.CARD_LIM_AMT /*카드한도금액*/ , A.CARD_USE_AMT /*카드사용금액*/ , A.CARD_RES_AMT /*카드잔여금액*/ FROM TB_CBCL_OPCS_ADJ_CARD_IZ A /*T:운영비정산카드내역*/ INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ B /*T:월파트너내역*/ ON B.BASE_YM = A.BASE_YM AND B.OG_TP_CD = A.OG_TP_CD AND B.PRTNR_NO = A.ADJ_PRTNR_NO WHERE 1=1 AND A.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.BASE_YM = #{baseYm} /*부모화면에서 리턴 받은 기준년월*/ AND A.OG_TP_CD = #{ogTpCd} /*팝업화면 상단 조회 결과로 리턴받은 조직유형코드*/ AND A.ADJ_PRTNR_NO = #{adjPrtnrNo} /*팝업화면 상단 조회 결과로 리턴받은 파트너번호*/ ) T1 WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY T1.BASE_YM , T1.PSTN_DV_CD , T1.RSB_DV_CD , T1.RSB_DV_NM , T1.OG_ID , T1.ADJ_OG_NM , T1.ADJ_PRTNR_NO , T1.ADJ_USR_NM , T1.OPCS_ADJ_NO , T1.ADJ_YN
mapper.update:
UPDATE TB_CBCL_OPCS_ADJ_BAS /*T:운영비정산기본*/ SET ADJ_OG_ID = #{adjOgId} /*3번 조회 결과에서 리턴된 ADJ_OG_ID*/ , PSTN_DV_CD = #{pstnDvCd} /*3번 조회 결과에서 리턴된 PSTN_DV_CD*/ , USE_AMT = #{cardUseAmt} /*3번 조회 결과에서 리턴된 CARD_USE_AMT*/ , OPCS_DST_OPT_CD = #{pdstOpt} /*배분옵션 선택 값*/
WHERE 1=1 AND OPCS_ADJ_NO = #{opcsAdjNo} /*3번 조회 결과에서 리턴된 OPCS_ADJ_NO*/
UPDATE TB_CBCL_OPCS_ADJ_DTL /*T:운영비정산상세*/ SET DTA_DL_YN = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND OPCS_ADJ_NO = #{opcsAdjNo} /*3번 조회 결과에서 리턴된 OPCS_ADJ_NO*/
mapper.select: SELECT (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(MAX(OPCS_ADJ_NO),1,6) = #{baseYm} THEN #{baseYm}||LPAD((CAST(SUBSTR(MAX(OPCS_ADJ_NO),7,6) AS INT)+1),6,0) ELSE #{baseYm}||LPAD('1',6,0) END) AS OPCS_ADJ_NO /*운영비정산번호*/ FROM TB_CBCL_OPCS_ADJ_BAS WHERE 1=1
mapper.update:
UPDATE TB_CBCL_OPCS_ADJ_CARD_IZ SET OPCS_ADJ_NO = #{opcsAdjNo} /*운영비정산번호-5.1.에서 리턴 받은 값*/ , ADJ_YN = 'Y' /*정산여부*/
WHERE 1=1 AND BASE_YM = #{baseYm} /*기준년월-부모창에서 리턴 받은 값*/ AND OG_TP_CD = #{ogTpCd} /*조직유형코드-하단 grid의 OG_TP_CD*/ AND ADJ_PRTNR_NO = #{adjPrtnrNo} /*정산파트너번호-하단 grid의 ADJ_PRTNR_NO*/
